H0.text: Who would use the expression a right plonker. Rodney Trotter

H1.text: Who would use the expression a right plonker. Danny Dyer

H2.text: Who would use the expression a right plonker. Shane Richie

H3.text: Who would use the expression a right plonker. Delboy

A5.text: Del's comments whenever Rodney makes a mistake, including 'Plonker', 'Wally', 'Twonk', 'Dipstick' and 'Tart', became notable catchphrases throughout the series.
